chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), increasing_app bool (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
increasing_app : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Prop
predta_coacc_states_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
predta_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc d a m)
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_l : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
map_replace_inc_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_replace bool m0 a b) (map_replace bool m1 a b)
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
coacc_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a1 a2 -> coacc d a0 a2
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
MapDom_Dom : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad), in_dom A a m = in_FSet a (MapDom A m)
map_replace_inc : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (map_replace bool m0 a b) (map_replace bool m1 a b)
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
iteres_incr : forall (A : Set) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), r x (f x) -> increasing_app A r f -> prechain_incr A r (iteres A f x n)
map_or_def_ok : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 (map_or m0 m1)
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem...
iteres_inf_fps : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (e x : Map A) (n : nat), mini A r T e -> fix_point A T f x -> increasing_app A r f -> r (power (Map A) f e n) x
map_mini : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
iteres_increasing_chain : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> increasing_app A r f -> r x (f x) -> chain A T r (iteres A f x n)
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
coacc_transitive_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a2
semantic_equiv_0_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (H : rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true) => let H0 : p = prec_empty := semantic_equiv_0_0 d p n H in (fun H1 : p = prec_empty => eq_ind_r (fun p0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d p0 tnil) (rec_empty d) H1) H0 : sem_equiv_prop_l tnil

```coq
intros d a.
unfold increasing_app, lemd, predta_coacc.
intros m.
rewrite <- map_replace_def_ok_d with (m0 := predta_coacc_0 d d m) (x := true).
apply map_replace_inc_d.
apply predta_coacc_def_ok.
Qed.
```
